dmca.title: DMCA Notification-deal.ritebuys.com/Furman
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Shalonda Odoms [mailto:sodoms@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, August 02, 2006 8:15 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA Notification-deal.ritebuys.com/Furman
Subject: DMCA Notification-deal.ritebuys.com/Furman


To Whom It Concern, 

The below is a DMCA notification regarding deal.ritebuys.com and our client Furman.
It has been identified that deal.ritebuys.com is currently using the copyrighted
material of Furman without authorization. 

Thanks,







Shalonda

LMS Associate

Net Enforcers, Inc. 

sodoms@netenforcers.com

compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally privileged.
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or
dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. 
________________________________

Phoenix Office:

Ellis & Venable

101 N. First Avenue, Suite 1875

Phoenix, Arizona 85003

voice: (602) 631-9393

fax: (602) 631-9796

 

8/2/2006

 


7005 1820 0001 9159 7195


 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

Designated Agent

The Planet.com

George Poletes

1333 Stemmons Pwyste 110

Dallas, TX 75207


Re:      Unauthorized Use of Furman's  Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

 

Dear Designated Agent:

This office is authorized to act on behalf of Furman in this matter.

 

            This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
